symlink_test.comment: Ensure '.mysql_history' Is Symbolically Linked To '/dev/null' For All Users

textfilecontent54_test.comment: Verify That 'MYSQL_PWD' Is Not Set In .bashrc
Verify That 'MYSQL_PWD' Is Not Set In .bash_profile
Verify That 'MYSQL_PWD' Is Not Set In .profile

sql57_test.comment: Ensure 'default_password_lifetime' Is Less Than or Equal to '365'
Ensure no users' exist where 'password_lifetime' is null, 0, or greater than '365'
Ensure check_username is set to ON
Ensure length is configured to at least 14
Ensure mixed_case_count is configured to at least 1
Ensure special_char_count is configured to at least 1
Ensure number_count is configured to at least 1
Ensure password_history is configured to at least 5 changes
Ensure password_reuse_interval is configured to at least 365 days
Ensure password_require_current is set to ON
Ensure block_encryption_mode is set to aes 256
Ensure MySQL is bound to at least one IP
Ensure TLSv1 and TLSv1.1 are not accepted
Ensure connection_control_failed_connections_threshold is greater than or equal to 5
Ensure connection_control_min_connection_delay is greater than or equal to 60000
Ensure connection_control_max_connection_delay is greater than or equal to 1920000

file_test.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'datadir' are '750' or More Restrictive
Ensure permissions on 'log_bin_basename' files are '660' or More Restrictive
Ensure Permissions On 'log_error' File are '660' or More Restrictive

sql57_test.comment: Ensure slow query log is set to OFF

file_test.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'slow_query_log' File are '660' or More Restrictive
Ensure permissions on 'relay_log_basename' files are '660' or More Restrictive
Ensure Permissions On 'general_log_file' File are '660' or More Restrictive

sql57_test.comment: Ensure a path is not included in SSL Key File values

file_test.comment: Ensure '400:mysql:mysql' Permissions On SSL Key and Certificate Files with Path Info
Ensure Permissions On 'plugin_dir' are '554' or More Restrictive

sql57_test.comment: Ensure MySQL version is greater than or equal to 8.0.21
Ensure a filter exists to log ALL events
EnsureGlobal Variables like 'audit_log_strategy' are set to 'SYNCHRONOUS' or 'SEMISYNCHRONOUS'
Ensure default_authentication_plugin is Not Set to 'mysql_native_password'
Ensure Global Variables like 'default_password_lifetime' Are Less Than Or Equal To '365'
Ensure Global Variables like 'default_password_lifetime' Are Not '0'
Ensure 'validate_password.length' is greater than or equal to '14'
Ensure 'validate_password.mixed_case_count' is greater than or equal to '1'
Ensure 'validate_password.number_count' is greater than or equal to '1'
Ensure 'validate_password.special_char_count' is greater than or equal to '1'
Ensure 'host' is not equal to '%' for all users
Ensure 'ssl_type' is not blank for any user
Ensure SSL Key and Certificate Files are configured

file_test.comment: Ensure '400:mysql:mysql' Permissions On SSL Key and Certificate Files without Path Info in the Data Directory
Ensure permissions on 'audit_log_file' are '660' or more restrictive

sql57_test.comment: Ensure the 'secure_file_priv' is not an empty string

file_test.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'keyring_file_data' File are '750' or More Restrictive
Ensure Permissions On 'keyring_encrypted_file_data' File are '750' or More Restrictive
Ensure Permissions On 'keyring_okv' File are '750' or More Restrictive
Ensure Permissions On 'keyring_hashicorp_store_path' File are '750' or More Restrictive
Ensure Permissions On 'keyring_aws' File are '750' or More Restrictive
Ensure Permissions On 'keyring_oci_key_file' File are '750' or More Restrictive

textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure Passwords Are Not Stored in the Global Configuration

symlink_object.comment: Ensure '.mysql_history' Is Symbolically Linked To '/dev/null' For All Users

password_object.comment: Ensure '.mysql_history' Is Symbolically Linked To '/dev/null' For All Users

textfilecontent54_object.comment: Verify That 'MYSQL_PWD' Is Not Set In .bashrc
Verify That 'MYSQL_PWD' Is Not Set In .bash_profile
Verify That 'MYSQL_PWD' Is Not Set In .profile

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'binlog_expire_logs_seconds' is not set to '0'.
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE, 'BINLOG - Expiration' as Note FROM performance_schema.global_variables where variable_name = 'binlog_expire_logs_seconds';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'binlog_encryption' is set to 'ON'
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE, 'BINLOG - At Rest Encryption' as Note FROM performance_schema.global_variables where variable_name = 'binlog_encryption';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'default_password_lifetime' Is Less Than or Equal to '365'
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE FROM performance_schema.global_variables where VARIABLE_NAME like 'default_password_lifetime';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'default_password_lifetime' Is Greater Than '0'
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE FROM performance_schema.global_variables where VARIABLE_NAME like 'default_password_lifetime';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure no users' exist where 'password_lifetime' is null, 0, or greater than '365'
sql57_object.sql: SELECT user, host, password_lifetime from mysql.user where password_lifetime = 0 OR password_lifetime >= 365;

sql57_object.comment: Ensure component_validate_password is installed
sql57_object.sql: SELECT count(component_urn) AS count FROM mysql.component WHERE component_urn='file://component_validate_password' group by component_urn;

sql57_object.comment: Ensure check_username is set to ON
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE FROM performance_schema.global_variables where VARIABLE_NAME like 'validate_password.check_user_name';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure dictionary_file is configured
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE FROM performance_schema.global_variables where VARIABLE_NAME in ('validate_password.dictionary_file');

sql57_object.comment: Ensure length is configured to at least 14
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE FROM performance_schema.global_variables where VARIABLE_NAME in ('validate_password.length');

sql57_object.comment: Ensure mixed_case_count is configured to at least 1
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE FROM performance_schema.global_variables where VARIABLE_NAME in ('validate_password.mixed_case_count');

sql57_object.comment: Ensure special_char_count is configured to at least 1
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE FROM performance_schema.global_variables where VARIABLE_NAME in ('validate_password.special_char_count');

sql57_object.comment: Ensure number_count is configured to at least 1
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE FROM performance_schema.global_variables where VARIABLE_NAME in ('validate_password.number_count');

sql57_object.comment: Ensure password_history is configured to at least 5 changes
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE FROM performance_schema.global_variables where VARIABLE_NAME in ('password_history');

sql57_object.comment: Ensure password_reuse_interval is configured to at least 365 days
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE FROM performance_schema.global_variables where VARIABLE_NAME in ('password_reuse_interval');

sql57_object.comment: Ensure password_require_current is set to ON
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE FROM performance_schema.global_variables where VARIABLE_NAME in ('password_require_current');

sql57_object.comment: Ensure block_encryption_mode is set to aes 256
sql57_object.sql: select @@block_encryption_mode;

sql57_object.comment: Ensure MySQL is bound to at least one IP
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE FROM performance_schema.global_variables WHERE VARIABLE_NAME = 'bind_address';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure TLSv1 and TLSv1.1 are not accepted
sql57_object.sql: SHOW GLOBAL VARIABLES LIKE 'tls_version';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'ssl_type' is configured to 'X509' or 'SPECIFIED'
sql57_object.sql: select user, host, ssl_type from mysql.user where user not in (mysql.infoschema, mysql.session, mysql.sys);

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'ssl_cipher' is configured correctly
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE FROM performance_schema.global_variables WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='ssl_cipher';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'tls_ciphersuites' is configured correctly
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE FROM performance_schema.global_variables WHERE VARIABLE_NAME='tls_ciphersuites';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure connection controls are active
sql57_object.sql: SELECT PLUGIN_NAME, PLUGIN_STATUS FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.PLUGINS WHERE PLUGIN_NAME LIKE 'connection%';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure connection_control_failed_connections_threshold is greater than or equal to 5
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE FROM performance_schema.global_variables WHERE VARIABLE_NAME LIKE 'connection_control_failed_connections_threshold';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure connection_control_min_connection_delay is greater than or equal to 60000
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE FROM performance_schema.global_variables WHERE VARIABLE_NAME LIKE 'connection_control_min_connection_delay';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure connection_control_max_connection_delay is greater than or equal to 1920000
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE FROM performance_schema.global_variables WHERE VARIABLE_NAME LIKE 'connection_control_max_connection_delay';

file_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'datadir' are '750' or More Restrictive

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'datadir' are '750' or More Restrictive
sql57_object.sql: show variables where variable_name = 'datadir';

file_object.comment: Ensure permissions on 'log_bin_basename' files are '660' or More Restrictive

sql57_object.comment: Ensure permissions on 'log_bin_basename' files are '660' or More Restrictive
sql57_object.sql: SELECT @@GLOBAL.log_bin_basename AS value;

file_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'log_error' File are '660' or More Restrictive

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'log_error' File are '660' or More Restrictive
sql57_object.sql: SELECT @@GLOBAL.log_error AS value;

sql57_object.comment: Ensure slow query log is set to OFF
sql57_object.sql: show variables like 'slow_query_log';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'slow_query_log' does not exist
sql57_object.sql: SELECT @@GLOBAL.slow_query_log_file AS value;

file_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'slow_query_log' File are '660' or More Restrictive

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'slow_query_log' File are '660' or More Restrictive
sql57_object.sql: SELECT @@GLOBAL.slow_query_log_file AS value;

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'relay_log_basename' file does not exist
sql57_object.sql: SELECT @@GLOBAL.relay_log_basename AS value;

file_object.comment: Ensure permissions on 'relay_log_basename' files are '660' or More Restrictive

sql57_object.comment: Ensure permissions on 'relay_log_basename' files are '660' or More Restrictive
sql57_object.sql: SELECT @@GLOBAL.relay_log_basename AS value;

sql57_object.comment: Ensure general_log is set to 0
sql57_object.sql: select @@GLOBAL.general_log AS value;

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'general_log_file' does not exist
sql57_object.sql: SELECT @@GLOBAL.general_log_file AS value;

file_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'general_log_file' File are '660' or More Restrictive

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'general_log_file' File are '660' or More Restrictive
sql57_object.sql: SELECT @@GLOBAL.general_log_file AS value;

sql57_object.comment: Ensure a path is not included in SSL Key File values
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM performance_schema.global_variables WHERE REGEXP_LIKE(VARIABLE_NAME,'^.*ssl_(ca|capath|cert|crl|crlpath|key)$') AND VARIABLE_VALUE <> '';

file_object.comment: Ensure '400:mysql:mysql' Permissions On SSL Key and Certificate Files with Path Info

sql57_object.comment: Ensure '400:mysql:mysql' Permissions On SSL Key and Certificate Files with Path Info
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM performance_schema.global_variables WHERE REGEXP_LIKE(VARIABLE_NAME,'^.*ssl_(ca|capath|cert|crl|crlpath|key)$') AND VARIABLE_VALUE <> '';

file_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'plugin_dir' are '554' or More Restrictive

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'plugin_dir' are '554' or More Restrictive
sql57_object.sql: show variables where variable_name = 'plugin_dir';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure auditing is installed.
sql57_object.sql: SELECT @@GLOBAL.audit_log_file;

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'keyring_file_data' Exists
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_PATH FROM performance_schema.variables_info WHERE VARIABLE_NAME = 'keyring_file_data';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'keyring_encrypted_file_data' Exists
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_PATH FROM performance_schema.variables_info WHERE VARIABLE_NAME = 'keyring_encrypted_file_data';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'keyring_okv' Exists
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_PATH FROM performance_schema.variables_info WHERE VARIABLE_NAME = 'keyring_okv';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'keyring_hashicorp_store_path' Exists
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_PATH FROM performance_schema.variables_info WHERE VARIABLE_NAME = 'keyring_hashicorp_store_path';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'keyring_aws' Exists
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_PATH FROM performance_schema.variables_info WHERE VARIABLE_NAME = 'keyring_aws';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'keyring_oci_key_file' Exists
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_PATH FROM performance_schema.variables_info WHERE VARIABLE_NAME = 'keyring_oci_key_file';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'test' database does not exist
sql57_object.sql: SHOW DATABASES LIKE 'test';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure MySQL version is greater than or equal to 8.0.21
sql57_object.sql: select @@version;

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'local_infile' is 'OFF'
sql57_object.sql: SHOW VARIABLES WHERE variable_name = 'local_infile';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'have_symlink' is 'DISABLED'
sql57_object.sql: SHOW VARIABLES WHERE variable_name = 'have_symlink';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'daemon_memcached' is disabled
sql57_object.sql: SELECT * FROM information_schema.plugins WHERE PLUGIN_NAME='daemon_memcached';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'sql_mode' contains 'STRICT_ALL_TABLES'
sql57_object.sql: SHOW VARIABLES WHERE variable_name = 'sql_mode';

sql57_object.comment: Check if TDE is enabled
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_NAME, VARIABLE_VALUE, 'AT REST ENCRYPTION' as Note, IF(VARIABLE_VALUE = 'AES', 'Encrypted', 'Not Encrypted') as IsEncrypted FROM performance_schema.global_variables where variable_name in ('audit_log_encryption', 'binlog_encryption', 'innodb_redo_log_encrypt', 'innodb_undo_log_encrypt', 'table_encryption_privilege_check');

sql57_object.comment: Ensure all tables are encrypted
sql57_object.sql: SELECT INNODB_TABLESPACES.NAME, INNODB_TABLESPACES.ENCRYPTION FROM information_schema.INNODB_TABLESPACES WHERE NAME NOT IN ('innodb_temporary','sys/sys_config');

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'log_error' is not `stderr`
sql57_object.sql: SHOW VARIABLES WHERE variable_name = 'log_error';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure not root (`/`), `/var`, or `/usr`
sql57_object.sql: SELECT @@global.log_bin_basename;

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'log_error_verbosity' is set to '2'
sql57_object.sql: SHOW VARIABLES WHERE variable_name = 'log_error_verbosity';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure a filter exists to log ALL events
sql57_object.sql: SELECT * FROM mysql.audit_log_filter;

sql57_object.comment: EnsureGlobal Variables like 'audit_log_strategy' are set to 'SYNCHRONOUS' or 'SEMISYNCHRONOUS'
sql57_object.sql: SHOW GLOBAL VARIABLES LIKE 'audit_log_strategy';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure `audit_log` has `LOAD_OPTION` set to `FORCE_PLUS_PERMANENT`
sql57_object.sql: SELECT LOAD_OPTION FROM information_schema.plugins WHERE PLUGIN_NAME='audit_log';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure default_authentication_plugin is Not Set to 'mysql_native_password'
sql57_object.sql: SHOW VARIABLES WHERE Variable_name = 'default_authentication_plugin';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure All Users Have Passwords
sql57_object.sql: SELECT User,host FROM mysql.user WHERE (plugin IN('mysql_native_password', 'mysql_old_password','') AND (LENGTH(authentication_string) = 0 OR authentication_string IS NULL)) OR (plugin='sha256_password' AND LENGTH(authentication_string) = 0);

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Global Variables like 'default_password_lifetime' Are Less Than Or Equal To '365'
sql57_object.sql: SHOW VARIABLES LIKE 'default_password_lifetime';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Global Variables like 'default_password_lifetime' Are Not '0'
sql57_object.sql: SHOW VARIABLES LIKE 'default_password_lifetime';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'validate_password.length' is greater than or equal to '14'
sql57_object.sql: SHOW VARIABLES LIKE 'validate_password.length';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'validate_password.mixed_case_count' is greater than or equal to '1'
sql57_object.sql: SHOW VARIABLES LIKE 'validate_password.mixed_case_count';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'validate_password.number_count' is greater than or equal to '1'
sql57_object.sql: SHOW VARIABLES LIKE 'validate_password.number_count';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'validate_password.special_char_count' is greater than or equal to '1'
sql57_object.sql: SHOW VARIABLES LIKE 'validate_password.special_char_count';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'validate_password.policy' is set to 'STRONG'
sql57_object.sql: SHOW VARIABLES LIKE 'validate_password_policy';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'validate_password.check_user_name' is set to 'ON'
sql57_object.sql: SHOW VARIABLES LIKE 'validate_password.check_user_name';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'validate_password.dictionary_file' is configured
sql57_object.sql: SHOW VARIABLES LIKE 'validate_password.dictionary_file';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'host' is not equal to '%' for all users
sql57_object.sql: SELECT user, host FROM mysql.user WHERE host = '%';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure no anonymous accounts exist
sql57_object.sql: SELECT user,host FROM mysql.user WHERE user = '';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'have_ssl' is set to 'YES'
sql57_object.sql: SHOW VARIABLES WHERE variable_name = 'have_ssl';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'require_secure_transport' is set to 'ON'
sql57_object.sql: select @@require_secure_transport;

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'ssl_type' is not blank for any user
sql57_object.sql: SELECT user, host, ssl_type FROM mysql.user WHERE NOT HOST IN ('::1', '127.0.0.1', 'localhost') AND ssl_type != 'ANY' AND ssl_type != 'X509' AND ssl_type != 'SPECIFIED';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'master_info_repository' is set to 'TABLE'
sql57_object.sql: SHOW VARIABLES WHERE variable_name = 'master_info_repository';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure SSL Key and Certificate Files are configured
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM performance_schema.global_variables WHERE REGEXP_LIKE(VARIABLE_NAME,'^.*ssl_(ca|capath|cert|crl|crlpath|key)$') AND VARIABLE_VALUE <> '';

file_object.comment: Ensure '400:mysql:mysql' Permissions On SSL Key and Certificate Files without Path Info in the Data Directory

sql57_object.comment: Ensure '400:mysql:mysql' Permissions On SSL Key and Certificate Files without Path Info in the Data Directory
sql57_object.sql: show variables where variable_name = 'datadir';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure '400:mysql:mysql' Permissions On SSL Key and Certificate Files without Path Info in the Data Directory
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_VALUE FROM performance_schema.global_variables WHERE REGEXP_LIKE(VARIABLE_NAME,'^.*ssl_(ca|capath|cert|crl|crlpath|key)$') AND VARIABLE_VALUE <> '';

file_object.comment: Ensure permissions on 'audit_log_file' are '660' or more restrictive

sql57_object.comment: Ensure permissions on 'audit_log_file' are '660' or more restrictive
sql57_object.sql: SELECT @@GLOBAL.datadir AS value;

sql57_object.comment: Ensure permissions on 'audit_log_file' are '660' or more restrictive
sql57_object.sql: SELECT @@GLOBAL.audit_log_file AS value;

sql57_object.comment: Ensure the 'secure_file_priv' is not an empty string
sql57_object.sql: SHOW VARIABLES WHERE variable_name = 'secure_file_priv';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'component_validate_password' is installed
sql57_object.sql: SELECT COMPONENT_URN FROM mysql.component WHERE COMPONENT_URN LIKE '%component_validate_password%';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'super_priv' equals 'N' for 'repl' user
Ensure 'repl' does not use '%' for 'host'

file_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'keyring_file_data' File are '750' or More Restrictive

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'keyring_file_data' File are '750' or More Restrictive
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_PATH FROM performance_schema.variables_info WHERE VARIABLE_NAME = 'keyring_file_data';

file_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'keyring_encrypted_file_data' File are '750' or More Restrictive

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'keyring_encrypted_file_data' File are '750' or More Restrictive
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_PATH FROM performance_schema.variables_info WHERE VARIABLE_NAME = 'keyring_encrypted_file_data';

file_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'keyring_okv' File are '750' or More Restrictive

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'keyring_okv' File are '750' or More Restrictive
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_PATH FROM performance_schema.variables_info WHERE VARIABLE_NAME = 'keyring_okv';

file_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'keyring_hashicorp_store_path' File are '750' or More Restrictive

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'keyring_hashicorp_store_path' File are '750' or More Restrictive
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_PATH FROM performance_schema.variables_info WHERE VARIABLE_NAME = 'keyring_hashicorp_store_path';

file_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'keyring_aws' File are '750' or More Restrictive

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'keyring_aws' File are '750' or More Restrictive
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_PATH FROM performance_schema.variables_info WHERE VARIABLE_NAME = 'keyring_aws';

file_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'keyring_oci_key_file' File are '750' or More Restrictive

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Permissions On 'keyring_oci_key_file' File are '750' or More Restrictive
sql57_object.sql: SELECT VARIABLE_PATH FROM performance_schema.variables_info WHERE VARIABLE_NAME = 'keyring_oci_key_file';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'allow-suspicious-udfs' is Set to 'FALSE'
sql57_object.sql: SELECT DISTINCT VARIABLE_PATH FROM performance_schema.variables_info WHERE VARIABLE_PATH LIKE '%my.cnf';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'mysqld' Is Not Started with '--skip-grant-tables'
sql57_object.sql: SELECT DISTINCT VARIABLE_PATH FROM performance_schema.variables_info WHERE VARIABLE_PATH LIKE '%my.cnf';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure 'log-raw' Is Set to 'OFF'
sql57_object.sql: SELECT DISTINCT VARIABLE_PATH FROM performance_schema.variables_info WHERE VARIABLE_PATH IS NOT NULL AND VARIABLE_PATH <> '';

textfilecontent54_object.comment: Ensure Passwords Are Not Stored in the Global Configuration

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Passwords Are Not Stored in the Global Configuration
sql57_object.sql: SELECT DISTINCT VARIABLE_PATH FROM performance_schema.variables_info WHERE VARIABLE_PATH LIKE '%my.cnf';

symlink_state.comment: Ensure '.mysql_history' Is Symbolically Linked To '/dev/null' For All Users

password_state.comment: Ensure '.mysql_history' Is Symbolically Linked To '/dev/null' For All Users

sql57_state.comment: Ensure 'binlog_expire_logs_seconds' is not set to '0'.
Ensure 'binlog_encryption' is set to 'ON'
Ensure 'default_password_lifetime' Is Less Than or Equal to '365'
Ensure 'default_password_lifetime' Is Greater Than '0'
Ensure component_validate_password is installed
Ensure check_username is set to ON
Ensure length is configured to at least 14
Ensure mixed_case_count is configured to at least 1
Ensure special_char_count is configured to at least 1
Ensure number_count is configured to at least 1
Ensure password_history is configured to at least 5 changes
Ensure password_reuse_interval is configured to at least 365 days
Ensure password_require_current is set to ON
Ensure block_encryption_mode is set to aes 256
Ensure MySQL is bound to at least one IP
Ensure TLSv1 and TLSv1.1 are not accepted
Ensure 'ssl_type' is configured to 'X509' or 'SPECIFIED'
Ensure 'ssl_cipher' is configured correctly
Ensure 'tls_ciphersuites' is configured correctly
Ensure connection controls are active
Ensure connection_control_failed_connections_threshold is greater than or equal to 5
Ensure connection_control_min_connection_delay is greater than or equal to 60000
Ensure connection_control_max_connection_delay is greater than or equal to 1920000
